hiya ppl....great days begin with a shot: i got a question on the gnome terminal
when i open the terminal it opens in 80 x 24 size is there a way to open it in a bigger size ie 125 x 39 by default
you can do something like changing the menu entry to gnome-terminal --geometry=125x39 , or add an alias like alias gt='gnome-terminal --geometry=125x39'
